CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 23, 1945, p. 28, reads: "Waiting For Him - Mrs. Esther Baker, wife of Sgt. William A. Baker, Jr., and their two children, Marion and John, pray constantly for the return of their serviceman.  Sergeant Baker is tailor for about 1,500 men in the Fifty-first Group, and has completed sixteen months service in the South Pacific. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Esther Baker seated in chair with her children Marion and John Baker
